scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=local pm2 start bin/start --name EXCEL-MANAGEMENT-HOLDER-PROD
scripts.start:audit: cross-env NODE_ENV=local pm2 start bin/start --name EXCEL-MANAGEMENT-HOLDER-AUDIT
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=local pm2 start bin/start --name EXCEL-MANAGEMENT-HOLDER-DEV
scripts.create: cross-env NODE_ENV=local sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.create:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.create:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.create:audit: cross-env NODE_ENV=audit sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.create:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
